title: my sim card from old phone does not fit in the sim card holder; what type of sim card needed?
content: I have an HTC PG06100 (probably 10 years old, not sure) that used the Sprint network, I bought an unlocked pixel2 and my sim card looks too big, it doesn't snap into the tray.  Is there a particular size of sim card I need to order, are nano sim cards not all the same size?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
